insert into TA_JC_SUM_SUPERVISE_INFO (org_id,area_org_name,area_org_code,province_code,city_code,county_code,street_code,village_code,org_level,org_this_level,now_date,accept_now_date,accept_num,djz_accept_num,finish_num,djz_finish_num,normal_finish_num,before_finish_num,after_finish_num,unthreadfinish_num,throw_finish_num,day_finish_num,sum_wasting_time,charge_money,rightoff_num,respond_num,union_num,up_num,xzxk_num,fxzxk_num,bmfw_num,xzxk_finish_num,fxzxk_finish_num,bmfw_finish_num,complain_num,com_num,complain_reply_num,consult_num,consult_replay_num,money_num,normal_num,red_num,yello_num,green_num,status,now_normal_num,now_red_num,now_yello_num,now_green_num,finish_normal_num,finish_red_num,finish_yello_num,finish_green_num,supervise_green_num,supervise_yello_num,supervise_red_num,cancel_yellow_num,cancel_red_num,record_id,instance_supervise_green_num,instance_supervise_yello_num,instance_supervise_red_num,instance_cancel_yellow_num,instance_cancel_red_num,complain_supervise_green_num,complain_supervise_yello_num,complain_supervise_red_num,complain_cancel_yellow_num,complain_cancel_red_num,consult_supervise_green_num,consult_supervise_yello_num,consult_supervise_red_num,consult_cancel_yellow_num,consult_cancel_red_num)

mapper.select:
SELECT sys_guid() as record_id, '3' as status, t.ORG_ID, t.AREA_ORG_NAME, t.AREA_ORG_CODE, t.PROVINCE_CODE, t.CITY_CODE, t.COUNTY_CODE, t.STREET_CODE, t.VILLAGE_CODE, t.ORG_LEVEL, t.ORG_THIS_LEVEL, TO_CHAR(SUPERVISE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOW_DATE, TO_CHAR(SUPERVISE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCEPT_NOW_DATE, 0 AS ACCEPT_NUM, 0 AS DJZ_ACCEPT_NUM, 0 AS FINISH_NUM, 0 AS DJZ_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS NORMAL_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS BEFORE_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS AFTER_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS UNTHREADFINISH_NUM, 0 AS THROW_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS DAY_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS SUM_WASTING_TIME, 0 AS CHARGE_MONEY, 0 AS RIGHTOFF_NUM, 0 AS RESPOND_NUM, 0 AS UNION_NUM, 0 AS UP_NUM, 0 AS XZXK_NUM, 0 AS FXZXK_NUM, 0 AS BMFW_NUM, 0 AS XZXK_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS FXZXK_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS BMFW_FINISH_NUM, 0 AS COMPLAIN_NUM, 0 as com_num, 0 as complain_reply_num, 0 as consult_num, 0 as consult_replay_num, 0 AS MONEY_NUM, 0 AS NORMAL_NUM, 0 as RED_NUM, 0 as YELLO_NUM, 0 as GREEN_NUM, 0 as NOW_NORMAL_NUM, 0 as NOW_RED_NUM, 0 as NOW_YELLO_NUM, 0 as NOW_GREEN_NUM, 0 as FINISH_NORMAL_NUM, 0 as FINISH_RED_NUM, 0 as FINISH_YELLO_NUM, 0 as FINISH_GREEN_NUM, SUM(DECODE(T.SUPERVISE_RESULT_CODE, '1', 1, 0)) AS SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM, SUM( CASE WHEN T.SUPERVISE_RESULT_CODE = '2' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TA_JC_SUPERVISE_INFO SI WHERE T.business_id = SI.BUSINESS_ID AND SI.SUPERVISE_RESULT_NO = '3' AND SI.STATE NOT IN ('C','Q')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ELSE 0 END ) AS SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM, SUM(DECODE(T.SUPERVISE_RESULT_CODE, '3', 1, 0)) AS SUPERVISE_RED_NUM,
0 as CANCEL_YELLOW_NUM, 0 as CANCEL_RED_NUM,
0 AS INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM, 0 AS INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM, 0 AS INSTANCE_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM, 0 as INSTANCE_CANCEL_YELLOW_NUM, 0 as INSTANCE_CANCEL_RED_NUM,
0 AS COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM, 0 AS COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM, 0 AS COMPLAIN_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM, 0 as COMPLAIN_CANCEL_YELLOW_NUM, 0 as COMPLAIN_CANCEL_RED_NUM,
0 AS CONSULT_SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM, 0 AS CONSULT_SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM, 0 AS CONSULT_SUPERVISE_RED_NUM, 0 as CONSULT_CANCEL_YELLOW_NUM, 0 as CONSULT_CANCEL_RED_NUM FROM TA_JC_COUNT_INSTANCE_INFO1 A INNER JOIN TA_JC_COUNT_SUPERVISE_INFO T ON A.INSTANCE_ID = T.business_id GROUP BY t.ORG_ID,t.AREA_ORG_NAME,t.AREA_ORG_CODE,t.PROVINCE_CODE,t.CITY_CODE,t.COUNTY_CODE,t.STREET_CODE,t.VILLAGE_CODE,t.ORG_LEVEL,t.ORG_THIS_LEVEL,TO_CHAR(SUPERVISE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT T2.ID as orgId, T2.NAME as orgName, '2' as orgLevel, sum(T1.SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM) as warning, sum(T1.SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM) as yellowCard, sum(T1.SUPERVISE_RED_NUM) as redCard FROM ta_jc_sum_supervise_info T1 INNER JOIN V_ORG T2 ON t2.xzqm = t1.COUNTY_CODE WHERE to_date(T1.NOW_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (T1.SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM <> '0' OR T1.SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM <> '0' OR T1.SUPERVISE_RED_NUM <> '0') AND t2.CODE = '430601000000000000000000' AND t1.is_investment_supervision = '0' GROUP BY T2.ID, T2.NAME union all SELECT T1.ORG_ID as orgId, T1.AREA_ORG_NAME as orgName, T1.ORG_LEVEL as orgLevel, T1.SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM as warning, T1.SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM as yellowCard, T1.SUPERVISE_RED_NUM as redCard FROM ta_jc_sum_supervise_info T1 WHERE to_date(T1.NOW_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (T1.SUPERVISE_GREEN_NUM <> '0' OR T1.SUPERVISE_YELLO_NUM <> '0' OR T1.SUPERVISE_RED_NUM <> '0') AND T1.COUNTY_CODE = '430601000000' AND T1.is_investment_supervision = '0'
